RESOLVED_ENTITIES.The United States Court of Appeals for t: The United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.The United States Court of Appeals for t: court that hears appeals, including those related to illegal alien smuggling ventures, requiring a certificate of appealability before proceeding
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Nancy F. Atlas: judge who concludes that jurists of reason would not debate whether the movant has stated a valid claim or whether any procedural ruling in this case was correct, and orders the denial of Jose Marlon Ibarra-Zelaya's motion
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jose Marlon Ibarra-Zelaya: defendant claiming ineffective assistance of counsel due to incorrect application of sentencing guidelines
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Sentencing Guidelines Manu: manual used to determine sentences, with different editions having distinct implications for base offense levels and overall sentencing severity
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.ex post facto Law: law that prohibits applying a more onerous penalty than was in effect at the time of the offense
